author: @scottbennettcbapcbda8791
text: Great video Alex.  For soft skills, those are typical skills of business analysis.  Learning how to understand stakeholders, techniques for communiating effectively with stakeholders, etc. is where the International Institute of Business Analysis (IIBA) can help.  I'm happy to chat if you'd like to know more and perhaps we collaborate to share this with viewers.
